posts.post_content: Nice copy of the wonderful resourse book. Lightly used. Dust jacket has scratches. Askiing $40 US plus actual shipping from Calgary, AB, Canada. Paypal pls. Thanks! chris  [url]chris@pacmedia.ca[/url]
Dropped to $40 plus shipping. PayPal pls.
